Into the ValueVerse

This is a demo app I built as the "insert title" project to see what we could do with RSS feeds and music. All data here comes from RSS feeds on podcastindex.org. This is also a demo of a site for The Doerfels that I added other music I like also and some stuff to help test. -ChadF
